name: Red Pill
description:
Play Free Games on:
http://www.myarcadegames.net

Help your new favourite character Red Pill to get as far as possible!

This game will really challenge your skills

Jump from platform to platform, collecting points along the way. Hold screen to jump higher and release to fall on platform

Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours

Features:
-Insanely simple and addictive
-Endless gameplay
-One Touch gameplay
-High scores with Game Center
